entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
